author: vmassol
msg: new tutorial that explains all the different means to start Cactus tests, including the new one : from a Browser using the new Cactus ServletTestRunner ! Tutorial contains screenshots :-)

author: vmassol
msg: new Cactus Servlet Test Runner to quickly exercise test cases using a browser (no need to have  a full fledged Ant build script nor an existing JUnit Test Runner set up with the correct classpath to get started). A tutorial is forthcoming ...
